full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 5288-th ii 1056 PLACE HOCHIMINH MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION 12 NOV 85 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at BANGKOK THAILAND I certify that on the above date I examined AGE SEX NAME GROUP Lu CAM TiEu Apv 20, 1915 M I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions : CLASS NOV 1985 DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum CITY Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well- Being. CLASS C BP 170/100 P 78 Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below. revealed : (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A. B. or C-diagnosis. and pertinent details*) - Old, frail. - Vision : R. eye : 20/40. L. eye : 20/40. Both eyes: impaired vision. - Coronary insufficiency, arterial hypertension, BP 170/100mmHg, cardiomegaly. ECG : coronary insufficiency. LVH. Antihypertensive drugs havee been supplied - Conclusion : CLASS B. Re-exam. is necessary before departure for the USA the DR. NGUYEN LA HY 12 NOV. 85 Chest X-ray report FILM NO. 451: cardiomegaly DR. TUY 13 DEC. 85 Chest P.A. erect position. Impression: Cardiomegaly with LVE. No evidence of pulmonary infiltration. Normal both costophrenic sulci. (BY BGH) Blood serological report KOLLA NOV. 85 VDRL NEGATIVE DR. HANH from Dr. BANGKOK GENERAL HOSPITAL Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. BANGKOK GENERAL HOSPITAL quy Danl SAY from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT DIRECTOR OF PR. TRINH KIM ANH CHO RAY HOSP. 20 NOV. 85 50157-101 . Continue on reverse side if necessary. * GPO: 1975 OL-580-458 (79.1) OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Formerly FS-398) January 1975 DEPT. OF STATE
